articles.description: UPMC requires health care workers to get flu vaccine, but says there's no body of research to show whether a mandate would work with COVID-19 vaccine.
articles.content:
UPMC requires its health care employees to receive the flu vaccine. But it wont make them get the COVID-19 vaccine, which UPMC expects to begin offering to employees as soon as this month.
One reaso… [+3915 chars]

articles.title: Covid: The day of UK's 'tremendous shot in the arm' - BBC News
articles.description: From the first jab to that quote from the PM, the NHS's biggest ever vaccination programme is underway.
articles.content:
The NHS's biggest ever vaccination programme is underway; its first recipient: a grandmother from Coventry.
Margaret Keenan, who turns 91 next week, called it an "early birthday present".
